dataList.content: So, I hear you've defeated Shi Huazhen.
You would do best not to let that get to your head. He's always been our family's greatest shame.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Hey, watch yourself. Haven't you learned not to underestimate the family underdogs?
What...?

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Oh, you don't know? You see, I managed to talk Shi Huazhen into... you know?
W-what? No, it can't be. He cannot have spilled the beans on my parents'—

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Haah... My men are already on their way.
Ngh...! But how did you know it was Block 32?! I barely managed to get them a hiding spot there...

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Oh, so it's Block 32.
... Did you just—?

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: I did. Huh, that was way easier than it was during class.
I've heard stories about how you've changed... I didn't know you had changed into such a heartless woman!

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Hm.
Say something, dammit! Don't just stand there completely expressionless and—

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Mm.
Oh, I see. You won't be shaken by silly little things like this, is that it?

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Mmm.
... That may befit the seat of the Hierarch. However...
... a leader who responds with silence to their inferiors, a leader who considers them only disposable tools is bound to rot!
I, Shi Sijing, refuse to let someone so unqualified such as yourself retain power!
